column4: ok i finally got the thing booted....  now all i need is an initrd that will work.      2.6.15-20-386     sujestions ?

here's my issue,  at boot time it always drops me into a busybox shell in the ramfs   no device nodes in /dev but console and root    /  is on scsi sda1  ext2fs  but it cant mount /       i need a working initrd.img-2.6.15-20-386    i've rebuilt this one but it didn't help a thing.
check /boot/grub/grub.conf ? default breezy install for sata left me with a broken 'root=' option
i've re done lilo.conf and it's not the boot loader.
